st: Lakhon Hi Gham Hain Sagar Ko Jeevan Mein,
s:
Lakhon Hi Gham Hain Sagar Ko Jeevan Mein,
Ab Kya Kya Sabko Batlaaun Main,

Kar Sako Toh Karna Yaaro Itni Dua,
Is Duniya Se Jaldi Chala Jaaun Main…

st: Eh Mere Khuda Tu Itna Jarur Karna,
s:
Eh Mere Khuda Tu Itna Jarur Karna,
Do Chahne Walon Ko Kabhi Bhi Na Door Karna,

Bas Woh Likhana Ki Log Sagar Ko Na Bhool Paayein,
Kisi Ko Thhes Na Pahunche Yeh Dua Kabool Karna…

st: Dua Karna Yaaro Judaa Ho Rahe Hain,
s:
Dua Karna Yaaro Judaa Ho Rahe Hain,
Rahi Zindagi Toh Fir Aakar Milenge,

Agar Mar Gaye Toh Dua Karte Rahna,
Aansu Bahaane Ki Koshish Na Karna..

st: Aap Humko Bhula Chuke Ho Shayad,
s:
Aap Humko Bhula Chuke Ho Shayad,
Magar Hum Aapko Bhula Na Payenge,

Bas Aap Khus Raho Yehi Dua Karte Hain,
Hum Toh Zindagi Yun Hi Gujaare Jaayenge…

st: Dil Toh Karta Hai Khair Karta Hai,
s:
Dil Toh Karta Hai Khair Karta Hai,
Aapka Jikr Gair Karta Hai,

Kyo Na Main Dil Se Du Dua Usko,
Jabki Woh Mujhse Bair Karta Hai,

Aap Toh Hubhu Wohi Hain Jo,
Mere Sapno Mein Sair Karta Hai,

Ishq Kyu Aapse Yeh Dil Mera,
Mujhse Pooche Bagair Karta Hai,

Ek jarra Duayen Maa Ki Le,
Aasmano Ki Sair Karta Hai…

st: Udasi ke chehre padha mat karo
s:
Udasi ke chehre padha mat karo
Gajal aansuon se likha mat karo,

Bahar haal yeh aag hi aag hai
Chiragon ko aise chhua mat karo,

Dua aansuon mein khila phool hai
Kisi ke liye badduaa mat karo,

Tumhein log kahne lage bewafa
Jamane se itni wafa mat karo,

Khuda ke liye chandani raat mein
Akele akele fira mat karo

st: Tere ikhtiyar mein kya nahi
s:
Tere ikhtiyar mein kya nahi
Mujhe is tarah se navaj de,

Yeh duayen meri kabool ho
Mere lab par koi dua na ho,

Kabhi hum bhi uske karib the
Dil o jaan se badhkar ajij the,

Magar aaj aise mila hai woh
Jaise pahle kabhi milana ho…

st: Chahiye Kuchh Chahne Walon Ki Duayen Bhi,
s:
Chahiye Kuchh Chahne Walon Ki Duayen Bhi,
Vakt Ke Hamraah Badlati Hain Hawayen Bhi,

Yaar Bichhda Chalo Achha Hua Yeh Toh Jana,
Dil Mein Basta Hai Woh Najdik Bina Aaye Bhi,

Mahfil Sajti Nahin Mahaj Yun Hawa Pani Se,
Koi Toh Aake Rote Bachhon Ko Hansaaye Bhi,

Paar Karne Ke Liye Yeh Mout Se Bhari Sadkein,
Dekhna Toh Chahiye Tha Usko Dayein Bayein Bhi…

st: Duniya Na Jeet Paao To Haaro Na Khud Ko Tum,
s:
Duniya Na Jeet Paao To Haaro Na Khud Ko Tum,
Thodi Bahut Toh Jahan Mein Narajagi Rahe,

Gujro Jo Baag Se Toh Dua Mangate Chalo,
Jismein Khile Hain Phool Wo Dali Hari Rahe,

Har Vakt Har Mukam Pe Hansana Muhal Hai,
Rone Ke Waste Bhi Koi Bekali Rahe…

st: Kya Khak Ladengi,
s:
Kya Khak Ladengi,
Mere Dil Se, Teri Aankhe,
Jo Sharam Se Jhuki Hain,
Jo Chhupati Hain Haya Se,

st: Milkar Toh Unse,
s:
Milkar Toh Unse,
Dekhen Aainda Jo Mukkadar,
Ya Dosti Rahegi,
Yah Dushmani Rahegi,

st: Eh Falak Chain Se Dam Bhar,
s:
Eh Falak Chain Se Dam Bhar,
Toh Pada Rahne De,
Hum Bhi Baste Hain,
Jahan Khalke Khuda Basta Ha…

st: Woh Nahin Sunte Hamari Kya Karen,
s:
Woh Nahin Sunte Hamari Kya Karen,
Maangate Hain Dua Hum Jinke Liye,

st: Dil Maine Lagaya Hai Magar Dekhiye Kya Ho,
s:
Dil Maine Lagaya Hai Magar Dekhiye Kya Ho,
Sab Chhinkate Hain Apne Paraye Mere Aage,

st: Meri Tasveer Bhi Dekhi Toh Kaha Sharma Kar,
s:
Meri Tasveer Bhi Dekhi Toh Kaha Sharma Kar,
Yeh Bura Shakhs Hai Iski Niyat Nahi Achhi,

st: Vaade Se Pahle Yeh Dua Maang Lijiye,
s:
Vaade Se Pahle Yeh Dua Maang Lijiye,
Yarab Use Meri Kasam Ka Aitbaar Ho,

st: Kaisa Milan Kis Ki Tasalli Kahan Ka Lutf,
s:
Kaisa Milan Kis Ki Tasalli Kahan Ka Lutf,
Kuchh Ho Na Ho Bala Se Mere Dil Ki Khair Ho,

st: Hasrat Hai Usko Nikli Na Bismil Ki Aarju,
s:
Hasrat Hai Usko Nikli Na Bismil Ki Aarju,
Puri Kare Khuda Mere Kaatil Ki Aarju,

st: Gajab Hai Daag Ke Dil Se Tumhara Dil Nahin Milta,
s:
Gajab Hai Daag Ke Dil Se Tumhara Dil Nahin Milta,
Tumhara Chand Sa Mukhda Mahe Kaamil Se Milta Hai…

st: Woh Raham Khayenge Kya,
s:
Woh Raham Khayenge Kya,
Hosh Mein Aao Daag,
Tum Unke Aage,
Bura Haal Kyu Bana Ke Chale…

st: Raah Par Le Aaye Toh Hain,
s:
Raah Par Le Aaye Toh Hain,
Ghar Mein Bhi Jaayenge,
Ek Makbool Agar,
Meri Dua Aur Huyi…

st: Yeh But Jo Dete Hain Jhuti Jubaa Dete Hain,
s:
Yeh But Jo Dete Hain Jhuti Jubaa Dete Hain,
Khuda Ke Waste Par Log Jaan Dete Hain,

Hum Imtehaan Ke Sath Imtehan Lete Hain,
Woh Jaan Lene Ko Aaye Toh Jaan Dete Haib,

Thakan Pahunche Nakaatil Ke Daste Naajuk Ko,
Thahar Thahar Ke Bahut Imtehan Lete Hain,

Mere Fasane Ko Sun Sun Kar Neend Udhati Hai,
Duayen Mujhko Tere Passban Dete Hain….

st: Shole Dile Pursaaj Se Uthhte Hain Gajab Ke,
s:
Shole Dile Pursaaj Se Uthhte Hain Gajab Ke,
Yeh Aag Nahi Woh Jo Rahe Khak Mein Dab Ke,

Hota Hai Sareek Yeh Aap Dukh Dard Mein Sab Ke,
Kya Honsale Hain Yeh Dile Aajar Talab Ke,

Udhte Hi Pahunch Jaate Hain Ye Ta Dare Makshud,
Hai Daste Dua Mein Bhi Chalan Paaye Talab Ke,

Bewajah Koi Kisi Par Aasik Nahi Hota,
Hum Aalme Asabab Mein Kayal Hain Sabab Ke…

st: Yeh Baat Baat Mein Kya Najuki Nikalati Hai,
s:
Yeh Baat Baat Mein Kya Najuki Nikalati Hai,
Dabi Dabi Tere Lab Se Hansi Nikalti Hai,

Thhahar-Thhahar Kejala Dil Ko Ek Baar Na Foonk,
Ki Ismein Boo E Mohabbat Abhi Nikalati Hai,

Bajay Shikwa Ke Deta Hu Main Dua Usko,
Meri Jubaa Se Karun Kya Wohi Niaklati Hai,

Hazar Baar Jo Maanga Karo Toh Kya Haasil,
Dua Wohi Hai Jo Dil Se Nikalati Hai,

Ada Ada Se Teri Khinch Rahi Hain Talvaare,
Nigah Nigah Se Chhuri Par Chhuri Nikalati Hai…

st: Unhe Nafrat Huyi Saare Jahan Se,
s:
Unhe Nafrat Huyi Saare Jahan Se,
Nayi Duniya Koi Laaye Kahan Se,

Tere Hathon Mare Unki Dhool Se,
Jamin Takra Rahi Hai Aasmaan Se,

Parishaa Woh Uthe Gahri Neend Se,
Meri Duaayen Hai Aaho Fuga Se,

Tumhari Baat Lagti Hai Mujhe Teer,
Nigah Ka Kaam Lete Ho Jubaan Se…

st: Sararti Aankh Thi Woh Julfe Duta Aur Huyi,
s:
Sararti Aankh Thi Woh Julfe Duta Aur Huyi,
Yeh Bawale Dil Ek Aur Bala Huyi,

Charagar Se Mujhe Taklif Siwa Aur Huyi,
Dil Ko Tha Aur Marj Uski Dawa Aur Huyi,

Raah Par Aaaye Toh Hain Ghar Mein Bhi Aa Jayenge,
Ek Kabool Agar Meri Dua Aur Huyi,

Aadmi Ke Liye Jannat Bhi Na Dojakh Ho Jaaye,
Raas Kab Aayi Agar Aabo Hawa Aur Huyi,

Jurm Par Jurm Karun Denge Saja Kis Kis Ki,
Thak Na Jayenge Khata Par Jo Khata Aur Ho Huyi

st: Kisne Khusbu Se Basaya Hai Kafan Ko Mere,
s:
Kisne Khusbu Se Basaya Hai Kafan Ko Mere,
Ki Duayen Mujhe Sab Ahle Karam Dete Hain,

Mujhse Kahte Hain Woh Parwane Ko Dekha Tune,
Dekh Yun Jalte Hain Is Tarah Se Dam Dete Hain,

Tu Wafa Agar Karti Jo Eh Umar E Ravaan Kya Hota,
Bewafayi Pe Teri Sankado Dam Lete Hain,

Ranj Dene Kaabas Daag Hai Hai Sikwa Unse,
Jisko Deta Hai Khuda Usko Sanam Dete Hain….

st: Door Se Dekha Karo,Sunder Gulab Hote Hain,
s:
Door Se Dekha Karo,Sunder Gulab Hote Hain,
Haath Se Chhuna Nahin Kaante Hazar Hote Hain,

Pahle Agar Hamein Tera Pata Maalum Ho Jata,
Tere Virah Mein Dil Ko Itna Toh Na Tadpata,

Dilbar Ki Dilaggi Se Hum Dil Kho Chuke Hain,
Kal Tak Toh Khud Ke The Ab Unke Ho Chuke Hain,

Unse Hamara Aakhari Salaam Kah Dena,
Dil Hamein Na Bhule Kabhi Milne Ki Dua Kah Dena…

st: Sitaaron Se Puchho In Aankho Se Puchho,
s:
Sitaaron Se Puchho In Aankho Se Puchho,
Tumhaare Rahe Hain Jahan Bhi Rahe Hain,

Duniya Se Kya Khud Se Bhi Ghabra Ke Kah Diya,
Woh Meharbaa Nahi Toh Koi Meharbaa Nahin,

Fariyaad Ka Maja Hai Hoton Par Rahe Khamoshi ,
Aankhe Yeh Kah Rahi Hain Duaa Kar Rahe Hain…

st: Har Ek Jajbaat Ko Zubaan Nahin Milati,
s:
Har Ek Jajbaat Ko Zubaan Nahin Milati,
Har Ek Aarju Ko Dua Nahi Milati,

Mohabbatt Banaye Rakho,
To Duniya Hai Saat Tumhaare,

Varna Aansuon Ko To Aankho,
Mein Bhi Jagah Nahin Milati…

st: Beta Vaarish Hai, Beti Paaras Hai,
s:
Beta Vaarish Hai, Beti Paaras Hai,
Beta Vans Hai, Beti Ansh Ahai,

Beta Aan Hai, Beti Shaan Hai,
Beta Tan Hai, Beti Man Hai,

Beta Maan Hai, Beti Gumaan Hai,
Beta Sanskaar Hai, Beti Sanskriti Hai,

Beta Raag Hai, Beti Baag Hai,
Beta Dawa Hai, Beti Dua Hai,

Beta Bhagay Hai, Beti Vidhata Hai,
Beta Sabd Hai, Beti Arth Hai…

st: Teri Mohabbat Ke Pyase The,
s:
Teri Mohabbat Ke Pyase The,
Tabhi Toh Haath Faila Diye,

Warna Hum Toh,
Woh Khudgarz Hain,

Jo Khud Ki Zindagi Ke,
Liye Bhi Dua Nahi Karte…

st: Ah Jaalimo Apne Naseeb Pe Itna Naaaj,
s:
Ah Jaalimo Apne Naseeb Pe Itna Naaaj,
Na Karo, Vakt Toh Badlata Hi Rahta Hai,

Woh Sunega Yakinan Duaayen, Akele Hi,
Kya Khuda Sirf Tumhara Hai Hamara Nahin,

Ab Chala Hu Ghar Se Yeh Sochkar,
Ke Is Saahil Ka Koi Kinara Nahin,

Doonduga Use Ab Is Najar Se,
Na Pa Saka Toh Ab Koi Najara Nahin…

st: Bala Se Woh Dusman Huva Hai Kisi Ka,
s:
Bala Se Woh Dusman Huva Hai Kisi Ka,
Woh Kafir Sanam Kya Khuda Hai Kisi Ka,

Kisi Ki Tapish Mein Khusi Hai Kisi Ki,
Kisi Ki Khalish Mein Maja Hai Kisi Ka,

Jara Daal Do Apni Julfo Ka Saya,
Mukkadar Bahut Naarsa Hai Kisi Ka,

Meri Bazm Mein Aakar Woh Puchhte Hain
Bura Haal Hamne Suna Hai Kisi Ka,

Bache Jaan Kis Tarah Meri Dua Se,
Kajah Par Bas Chala Hai Kisi Ka…

st: Yeh Bhi Ek Dua Hai,
s:
Yeh Bhi Ek Dua Hai,
Khuda Se,

Kisi Ka Dil Na Dukhe,
Meri Vajah Se,

Eh Khuda Kar De Kuchh Aisi,
Inayat Mujh Par,

Ke Khusiya Hi Mile Sab Ko,
Meri Vajah Se…

st: Meri Hatheli Bhi Tum Apne Paas Rakhlo
s:
Meri Hatheli Bhi Tum Apne Paas Rakhlo
Jab Dua Karo To Use Bhi Utha Dena
Khushi Mile To Apni Hatheli Aage Karna
Gham Mile To Meri Hatheli Me Thama Dena…

st: Jeene Ki Nayi Adaa Di Hai,
s:
Jeene Ki Nayi Adaa Di Hai,

Khush Rahne Ki Usne Dua Di Hai,

Ah Khuda Mere Doston Ko Salamat Rakhna,

Jinhone Apne Dil Mein Mujhe Jagah Di Hai…

st: Kya Dosti Hai Hamaari,
s:
Kya Dosti Hai Hamaari,

Jo Main Tumpe Marta Hun,

Har Samay Tere Aane Ka,

Intezaar Karta Hun,

Naa Koi Gilla Hai Tumse,

Isiliye Toh Main Har Roj,

Tumhare Liye Khuda Se Dua Karta Hun…

st: Mujhe Dard-E-Ishq Ka Mazaa Maloom Hai,
s:
Mujhe Dard-E-Ishq Ka Mazaa Maloom Hai,
Dard-E-Dil Ki Inteha Maloom Hai,

Zindagi Bhar Muskuraane Ki Dua Naa Dena,
Mujhe Pal Bhar Muskuraane Ki Sazaa Maloom Hai

Bichad Jaana Tu Us Ke Liye Maayane Nahin Rakhta,
Jafaon Ka Apni Hisaab Woh Zubaani Nahin Rakhta,

Rotaa Nahin Yaa Use Ronaa Nahin Aata,
Sungdil Hai Yaa Phir Aankhon Mein Paani Nahin Rakhta…

st: Kabhi Ye Naaz Ke Vo Mera Hai Faqar Mera Hai,
s:
Kabhi Ye Naaz Ke Vo Mera Hai Faqar Mera Hai,
Kabhi Ye Darr Ke Vo Mujhse Khaffa Toh Nahi,
Kabhi Ye Dua Ke Usse Mile Jahan Ki Khushiyan,
Kabhi Ye Khauff Ke Vo Mere Bina Khush Toh Nahi…

st: Dua pe hamari aitbar rakhna,
s:
Dua pe hamari aitbar rakhna,

Dil me apne na koi sawal rakhna,

Dena chahte ho agar khushiya hame,

To bas aap khush rahna aur apna khayal rakhna…

st: Khuda se humne dua maangi,
s:
Khuda se humne dua maangi,
Dua mein apni mout mangi,
Khuda bola tujhe mout to de du,
Par usey kya kaho jisne har waqt teri zindagi ki dua mangi…

st: Khuda se maine ek dua maangi,
s:
Khuda se maine ek dua maangi,
Dua me apni maut maangi,
Phir khuda ne kaha maut to tujhe main de du,
Par usko kya kahu jisne teri lambi umar maangi…

st: Aye rab meri Duaoun me Asar itna Rahe
s:
Aye rab meri Duaoun me Asar itna Rahe
Meri Behan Ka Daaman hamesha Khushiyou Se Bhara Rahe
Agar Wo Kabhi Ho Andhere Me To Uska Humsafar Uske Saath Rahe
SadA Uske Pyaar Ka Diya Meri Behan Ki Rahoun me Jala Rahe
Un Dono Ki Jodhi hamesha Barkarar Rahe
Us Upar Wale ki Duaon Ka Haath Sada Unke Sar Pe Bana Rahe…

st: muddat baad aaj fir se unka deedar hua
s:
muddat baad aaj fir se unka deedar hua
yun laga zinda mere seene me dafan mera pyaar hua…
shayad dua me asar ho gya meri is kadar
ke khatam meri tanha zindagi ka intzaar hua..
firse chaahat si ho gyi zinda rehne ki aye dosto
jaise mujhko firse zindagi se pyaar hua…

st: Dard Hota Hai Magar Shikwa Nahi Karte
s:
Dard Hota Hai Magar Shikwa Nahi Karte
Kon Kehta Hai Ki Hum Wafa Nahi Karte
Aakhir Kyu Nahi Badlti Taqdeer ‘Ashiqe’ Ki
Kya Mujhko Chahne Wale Mere Liye Dua Nahi Karte…

st: Koi Samjhe Na Humko Beshak Par Aap To Samjhte Hain,
s:
Koi Samjhe Na Humko Beshak Par Aap To Samjhte Hain,
Apna Banate Hain Mere Har Gam Ko Tabhi To Hum Sambhalte Hain,
Khuda Har Ek Khushi De Aapko Har Ek Gam Humko Naseeb Ho,
Bas Yahi Dil Mei Sochkar Har Ek Dua Karte Hain…

st: Meri Har Aawaj Tere Liye Dua Maangti Hai,
s:
Meri Har Aawaj Tere Liye Dua Maangti Hai,
Meri Har Saans Tere Liye Fariyaad Mangti Hai,
Har Khusi Mile Tujhey Is Jahan Ki,
Har Gam Tera Mujhe Tohfey Me Mil Jaye,
Baar Baar Aye Ye Din Teri Zindagi Me,
Aur Har Baar Teri Khusi Parwaan Chad Jaye…

st: Pyar Ke Liye Us Se Izazat Mangi
s:
Pyar Ke Liye Us Se Izazat Mangi
Tute Dilne Bhi Uske Liye Dua Mangi
Jane Kya Baat Thi Us Bewafa Me Ki
Maine Aakhri Khwaish Me Bhi Us Se Milne Ki Dua Mangi…

st: Ae Rooh Tu Zara Dheere-Dheere Nikal
s:
Ae Rooh Tu Zara Dheere-Dheere Nikal
Kahi Us Bekhabar Ko Khabar Na Ho Jaye
Meri Zindagi Ki Dua Maangti Hai Wo
Kahi Uski Dua Ka Asar Na Ho Jaye…

st: Phool Khile Zindagi Ki Raah Mein
s:
Phool Khile Zindagi Ki Raah Mein
Hassi Chamakti Rahe Aapki Nigah Mein
Kadam Kadam Par Mile Khushi Ki Bahar Aapko
Dil Deta Hai Yehi Dua Baar Baar Apko…

st: Har Roz Tujh Se Milne Ki Dua Karenge
s:
Har Roz Tujh Se Milne Ki Dua Karenge
Teri Aarzu Mein Hasti Fana Karenge
Tu Chahe Daaman Bacha Le Hum Se
Hum Marte Dum Tak Tujh Se Wafa Karenge…

st: Muskurane Ki Har Wajah Aap Ho
s:
Muskurane Ki Har Wajah Aap Ho
Hamari Zindagi Mein Har Jagah Aap Ho
Hume Milegi Jab Bhi Koi Khushi
Hum Samajh Jayenge Khuda Se Dua Karne Wale Aap Ho…

st: Aise Kisi Rafeeq Ki Dunia Misaal De
s:
Aise Kisi Rafeeq Ki Dunia Misaal De
Main Usse Dard Mangu To Wo Dil Nikal De
Rab Jane Kiski Dua Mere Sath Hai
Main Doobna Chahu Bhi To Dariya Uchhaal De…

st: Meri Wafayein Hain Unki Wafaon Ke Saamne
s:
Meri Wafayein Hain Unki Wafaon Ke Saamne
Jaise Koi Chirag Ho Hawaon Ke Saamne
Kismat To Chahti Hai Tabaahi Meri
Lekin Majboor Hai Kisi Ki Duaon Ke Saamne…

st: Na Jeene Ki Khushi Na Marne Ka Gam
s:
Na Jeene Ki Khushi Na Marne Ka Gam
Bas Tumse Milne Ki Dua Karte Hain
Jeete Hain Is Aas Mein Ki Tum Ek Din Aaoge
Marte Isliye Nahi Ki Tum Akele Reh Jaoge…

st: Darguzar Uski Har Khata Kar Di Humne
s:
Darguzar Uski Har Khata Kar Di Humne
Uske Haq Mein Aaj Phir Dua Kar Di Humne
Ek Lamha Bhi Nahi Laga Khone Mein
Jisko Pane Mein Sari Zindagi Gujar Di Humne

st: Jise Koi Nahi Jaanta Use Rab Jaanta Hai
s:
Jise Koi Nahi Jaanta Use Rab Jaanta Hai
Raz Ko Raz Na Samjho Voh Sab Jaanta Hai
Maagna Hai To Khuda Se Maango
Jo Jubaan Pe Aane Se Pehle Dil Ki Dua Jaanta Hai

st: Dua Karo Ki Ye Paudha Sada Hara Hi Lage
s:
Dua Karo Ki Ye Paudha Sada Hara Hi Lage
Udasiyon Mein Bhi Chehra Khila-Khila Hi Lage

Ajeeb Shakhs Hai Naraz Ho Ke Hansta Hai
Main Chahta Hoon Khafa Ho To Voh Khafa Hi Lage

Nahi Hai Mere Muqaddar Mein Roshani Na Sahi
Ye Khidki Kholo Zara Subah Ki Hawa Hi Lage

st: Doosro Ko Humari Sazayein Na De
s:
Doosro Ko Humari Sazayein Na De
Chandni Raat Ko Bad-Duaein Na De

Phool Se Ashiqui Ka Hunar Sikh Le
Titliyan Khud Rukengi Sadayein Na De

Sab Gunaho Ka Ikrar Karne Lage
Is Kadar Khoobsurat Sazayein Na De

Main Bikhar Jayunga Aasuon Ki Tarah
Is Kadar Pyar Se Bad-Duayein Na De

st: Kabhi Yun Bhi Aa Meri Aankh Mein, Ke Meri Aankh Ko Khabar Na Ho
s:
Kabhi Yun Bhi Aa Meri Aankh Mein, Ke Meri Aankh Ko Khabar Na Ho
Mujhe Ek Raat Nawaz De, Magar Uske Baad Sehr* Na Ho

Voh Bada Raheem-O-Kareem Hai, Mujhe Ye Sift** Bhi Ata*** Kare
Tujhe Bhulne Ki Dua Karu To Meri Dua Mein Asar Na Ho

Kabhi Din Ki Dhoop Mein Jhoom Ke, Kabhi Shab Ke Phool Choom Ke
Yun Hi Sath-Sath Chalein Sada, Kabhi Khatm Apna Safar Na Ho

Mere Paas Mere Habeeb Aa Zara Aur Dil Se Kareeb Aa
Tujhe Dhadkano Mein Basa Loon Main Ki Bichdane Ka Koi Dar Na Ho

st: Vo Gunahgar Mere Hak Me Dua Kar Deta
s:
Vo Gunahgar Mere Hak Me Dua Kar Deta
Mere Sookhe Huye Jangal Ko Hra Kar Deta
